001.comments: This course does NOT fulfill the seminar requirement.  EXAM CONFLICT:  STUDENTS REGISTERED IN 468.003/588.003 OR 422.001/570C.001 ARE NOT ALLOWED TO BE REGISTERED IN 403.001, AND VICE VERSA.

description: This course is designed to teach students the law and policy involved in sentencing persons convicted of crimes. Students will develop an in-depth understanding of statutory and case law rules regarding sentencing and will be required to apply those rules to actual sentencing scenarios.
